data.title: The Lying Game's Alexandra Chando Reveals Why She Might Steal My Job and the Most Random Thing in Her Purse (Hint: It's Technically Invisible!)
data.meta_description: Since this questionnaire is all about obsessions, it's only fitting that Alexandra Chando—star of one of my biggest TV obsessions, The Lying Game--has filled this one out! The show is about twins separated at birth only to be reunited to such drama and scandal that I literally have anxiety in between episodes waiting to find out what will happen. I love Emma and Sutton, the vastly different twins that Alexandra plays, but I think you'll enjoy getting to know Alexandra all on her own!
data.text:
Since this questionnaire is all about obsessions, it's only fitting that Alexandra Chando—star of one of my biggest TV obsessions, The Lying Game--has filled this one out! The show is about twins separated at birth only to be reunited to such drama and scandal that I literally have anxiety in between episodes waiting to find out what will happen. I love Emma and Sutton, the vastly different twins that Alexandra plays, but I think you'll enjoy getting to know Alexandra all on her own!

My current obsession is: The song "We Are Young" by Fun

The first celeb I was obsessed with was: Freddie Prinze, Jr.

The celeb I'm currently obsessing over is: Ryan Gosling

My DVR is obsessed with recording: House Hunters on HGTV and Say Yes To The Dress on TLC

The movie I'm so obsessed with I know every word: Dirty DancingThe album I've always been obsessed with is: The Lion King Soundtrack (long story)

The book I'm obsessed with is: Eleven Minutes, Letters to a Young Poet

The meal I'm obsessed with is: Chocolate cupcakes with vanilla icing . . . Anything chocolate, really . . .

The internet sites I'm obsessed with are: asos.com, houzz.com, restorationhardware.com

The vacation spot I'm obsessed with is: New England beaches in the summer

The thing in my closet I'm most obsessed with is: Black Miu Miu ankle booties

My girl crush right now is: Adele

My childhood bedroom contained: A ton of stuffed animals and heart wallpaper

I could go bankrupt buying: Eye glasses

The best advice I ever got was: "Be a leader not a follower." Straight from my mother's mouth!

The career path I secretly want to take is: I've always wanted to work on a magazine (like Glamour!)

You would never believe it, but my co-stars and I are obsessed with: Austin, TX!! We shoot TLG there and love the city!

The one thing I admire most about my TV character(s) is: Emma's courage, Sutton's strength (and can we talk about the WARDROBE?!)

The one thing I would change about my TV character(s) is: Let's get Emma to be a little bit more of her own person, let's get Sutton to stop being such a bitch!

The most random thing in my purse right now is:

My Invisalign 'teeth.' I got them recently and carry them around with me everywhere I go and pop them in as often as possible to keep my teeth straight!

Tonight is the season finale of The Lying Game at 9 p.m. ET on ABC Family! Will you be watching? What are you dying to see happen tonight? What did you think of Alexandra's answers? Lets discuss!

More stars we're obsessed with!

Get to Know GCB's Jennifer Aspen--Also Better Known As Hilary Swank's Former Maid of Honor and Madonna Super Fan!

Ooh, the Preview for Pauly D's Spinoff--Or, As I'm Calling It, Entourage With Blowouts--Is Here! Check It Out

Can We All Agree Khloe Is the Most Likable Kardashian?

Photo: ABC Family
